shortdesc.ph: The configuration of the SDK log files.

pd.p: The absolute path of the log files.

The default paths for different platforms are as follows:
Android: /storage/emulated/0/Android/data/<package name>/files/agorasdk.log
iOS: App Sandbox/Library/caches/agorasdk.log
macOS:
If Sandbox is enabled: App Sandbox/Library/Logs/agorasdk.log, for example, /Users/<username>/Library/Containers/<App Bundle Identifier>/Data/Library/Logs/agorasdk.log.
If Sandbox is disabled: ~/Library/Logs/agorasdk.log
Windows: C:\Users\<user_name>\AppData\Local\Agora\<process_name>\agorasdk.logã€‚
Ensure that the directory for the log files exists and is writable. You can use this parameter to rename the log files.

plentry.pd: The size (KB) of a log file. The default value is 2014 KB. If you set fileSize to 1024 KB, the maximum aggregate size of the log files output by the SDK is 5 MB. If you set fileSize to less than 1024 KB, the setting is invalid, and the maximum size of a log file is still 1024 KB.
The output level of the SDK log file. See .
